course_title: Introduction to Ethical Data Science and Informatics
class_notes:
This course will be held in WMRB 4004


We will make special accommodations as needed for remote instruction. Your instructor will communicate the mode of instruction before the start of classes. If you need to request permission to enroll, please contact: study@dbmi.emory.edu
course_description: This course covers the basics of data science techniques needed for informatics, with a strong focus on ethics, equity, standards, and security.
sections: Class Nbr: 5662, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 9a-12p, Instructor: Clifford/Reyna, Status: Open
